Coordinating Army staff counterparts (parallel stakeholders; not in ASA(ALT) chain)

Deputy Chief of Staff, G-4 (Logistics): LTG Heidi Hoyle; SGM Robert Haynie.

Chief Information Officer (CIO): Mr. Leonel Garciga.

Deputy Chief of Staff, G-6: LTG Jeth Rey.
These are Army Staff/Secretariat partners that coordinate horizontally with ASA(ALT) on logistics, enterprise IT, and networks. 

20250505-asaalt-org-chart

How to read the relationships (quick context map)

ASA(ALT)/AAE is the top node for Army acquisition.

Principal deputies (military & civilian) and the Sergeant Major support enterprise leadership and execution.

DASAs/Directors own policy and oversight for their portfolios (Procurement, R&T, Sustainment, DES, etc.) and support the PEOs/JPEOs with resourcing and governance.

PEOs/JPEOs execute programs (weapons, sensors, comms, soldier systems, training, chem/bio, etc.) and align to ASA(ALT) for direction/oversight.

G-4, CIO, G-6 are external/parallel Army stakeholders that interface with ASA(ALT) but do not report to it.
